Tariff.description: Information about the tariff that are static and does not change during at least a month.

name.description: Descriptive short name of the grid tariff.

description.description: Detailed description of the grid tariff.

product.description: Name of the grid company product, for grid company internal use.

companyName.description: Name of the grid company. Ex. Elvia AS

companyOrgNo.description: Organization number of the grid company. Ex. 980489698

direction.description: Indicates if this is a tariff for consumption or production. Valid values are "consumption" and "production".

lastUpdated.description: The time of when the prices were last updated on the server side. No need to get prices if you already fetched the latest ones? Ex. 2021-11-05T00:00:00+01:00

billingFrequency.description: A time period that describes how often the customer is billed. E.g. "P1M" means billing is made at every new month.

FixedPrice.description: Prices and information for the fixed price component of the tariff.

description.example: Fixed price for a contract with a fuse size of 25 A.

EnergyPrice.description: Prices and information for the energy price component of the tariff.

description.example: Energy transfer price for one kWh.

PowerPrice.description: Prices with parameters that defines power peak identification and price calculation for the power component of the tariff.
